description: A group of six students at an ancient magical academy must prove their worth in a dangerous game that tests their skills, wit, and loyalty, while unraveling hidden secrets about the world they live in.

name: Circe
description: A retelling of the myth of Circe, the enchantress from Homer's 'Odyssey', this novel explores her transformation from a misunderstood daughter of gods to a powerful figure who shapes the world around her.

name: A Psalm for the Wild-Built
description: In a world where humanity has abandoned its industrial past, a tea monk and a robot embark on a journey of self-discovery and environmental healing in this heartwarming, speculative novel.

name: The Night Tiger
description: A passionate historical romance set in 1930s Malaysia, where a young woman embarks on a journey to uncover the mystery behind her master's death while developing a deep connection with a handsome doctor.

name: Crazy Rich Asians
description: A witty, fast-paced romance about a young woman who discovers her boyfriend is part of one of the richest families in Asia, leading her into a world of wealth, love, and family drama.

name: A Court of Thorns and Roses
description: A retelling of 'Beauty and the Beast', this romantic fantasy follows a young woman as she navigates a dangerous fae world, where love and power intertwine.

name: The Kiss of the Concubine
description: Set in the Mongol Empire, this romance tells the story of a woman who becomes the concubine of a powerful ruler, navigating court intrigues and forbidden love.

name: The Tea Girl of Hummingbird Lane
description: A heartfelt story about the bond between a mother and her daughter, set against the backdrop of China's tea plantations, where love, loss, and identity are explored.

name: Pride, Prejudice, and Other Flavors
description: A modern-day retelling of 'Pride and Prejudice', set in San Francisco, where a brilliant surgeon and a talented chef find themselves at odds, but sparks of love soon fly.

name: A Thousand Splendid Suns
description: In war-torn Afghanistan, two women form a bond of sisterhood and love, enduring hardship, betrayal, and sacrifice, making this a powerful and emotional tale of love and resilience.

name: The Rosie Project
description: A quirky romance about a socially awkward genetics professor who designs a scientific survey to find a wife, only to find love in the most unexpected way.

name: The Moon in the Palace
description: A historical romance set in ancient China, telling the story of the rise of Empress Wu, where love, power, and intrigue intermingle in the imperial court.

name: The Princess and the Fangirl
description: A fun, heartfelt romance where two young women, one a princess and the other a fangirl, discover their lives intertwined at a fan convention, leading to self-discovery and love.

name: The Girl from the Other Side
description: Set in a world divided by a mysterious curse, this story follows the emotional and romantic journey of a young girl and a mysterious beast from the other side of the curse, filled with love and sacrifice.

name: The Remains of the Day
description: Set in 1950s England, the story of a butler who looks back on his life, reflecting on the love and missed opportunities with the woman he served during his years of service in an English manor.

name: The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle
description: A complex tale of love, loss, and mystery that blends reality and fantasy, focusing on a man's search for his missing wife and uncovering deeper, hidden truths of their lives.

name: Norwegian Wood
description: A poignant coming-of-age novel about a young man navigating love, loss, and mental illness while attending university in Tokyo, as he grapples with his feelings for two very different women.

name: The Palace of Illusions
description: A romantic retelling of the Mahabharata from the perspective of a woman who becomes one of the most powerful figures in Indian mythology, blending love, destiny, and power in ancient India.

name: Love in the Time of Cholera
description: A sweeping tale of lifelong love and obsession, following the passionate romance between Florentino and Fermina, who reconnect after decades of separation, set against a backdrop of political turmoil in Colombia.

name: The Tea Girl of Hummingbird Lane
description: Set in the tea-growing regions of China, this story follows a young girl born into a family of tea pickers, her struggles with love and identity, and the powerful bond with her daughter who was given up for adoption.

name: The Night Circus
description: A magical, romantic tale set within a mysterious circus, where two young illusionists are bound in a competition that leads to love, intrigue, and fate-defying twists.

name: Memoirs of a Geisha
description: Set in Japan, this novel traces the life of a young girl who becomes one of the most renowned geishas of her time, and her love for a man she can never have, amidst the constraints of her culture.

name: The Wedding
description: A poignant story of a couple’s love story that endures across decades, dealing with themes of passion, regret, and forgiveness, set in the modern world where societal expectations complicate personal happiness.

name: The Book Thief
description: Set in Nazi Germany, this tale weaves love, loss, and survival through the eyes of a young girl who steals books and shares them with others during one of the darkest times in history.

name: Atonement
description: A sweeping story of love, guilt, and redemption, Atonement explores the consequences of a young girl's false accusation and how it impacts the love story between her sister and a young man during World War II.

name: The Nightingale
description: The story of two sisters in France during World War II, one seeking survival and the other seeking love, as their lives become intertwined with war and its devastating effects on their hearts.

name: Call Me by Your Name
description: A passionate and tender love story between two young men during a summer in Italy. As their love deepens, they are forced to confront the complexities of desire and heartbreak.

name: The Fault in Our Stars
description: A beautiful and heartbreaking romance between two teenagers battling cancer, their love blossoming as they navigate their final days together, bringing new meaning to life and love.

name: The Rosie Project
description: A quirky, heartwarming romance between a socially awkward genetics professor and a free-spirited woman who changes his life in unexpected ways.

name: The Sun Is Also a Star
description: Set in a single day, this book tells the story of a young couple from different backgrounds who meet by chance and discover a love that might change their lives forever.

name: Pride and Prejudice
description: A classic romance set in 19th-century England, following the complex and fiery relationship between Elizabeth Bennet and the aloof Mr. Darcy.

name: The Alchemist
description: A philosophical novel about following your dreams, featuring a young shepherd named Santiago, who embarks on a journey to find his personal legend and his love.

name: Me Before You
description: A story about a young woman who becomes the caregiver of a quadriplegic man, their relationship blossoming into a deep and unforgettable love that changes both of their lives.

name: The Gene: An Intimate History
description: This book explores the history of the gene, from its discovery to the present day, and its implications for humanity's understanding of genetics and inheritance.

name: The Great Indian Novel
description: A reimagining of India's history through the lens of science and culture, combining elements of mythology and modern narratives.

name: The Physics of Life
description: A thought-provoking exploration of how physics, biology, and the study of life intersect, examining how scientific concepts shape our understanding of life itself.

name: The Selfish Gene
description: Richard Dawkins introduces the concept of gene-centered evolution, highlighting the role of genes in shaping the evolution of life on Earth.

name: Cosmos
description: Carl Sagan's classic book takes readers on a journey through space and time, exploring the universe, the origin of life, and the human quest for knowledge.

name: The Man Who Knew Infinity
description: The biography of the legendary Indian mathematician Srinivasa Ramanujan, who made groundbreaking contributions to number theory despite having little formal education.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: Yuval Noah Harari's bestselling book traces the evolution of humanity, from the emergence of Homo sapiens to the modern age, offering insights into human behavior and societal development.

name: The Universe in a Nutshell
description: Stephen Hawking explores the mysteries of the universe, delving into complex scientific concepts such as quantum mechanics, black holes, and the nature of time.

name: The Emperor of All Maladies
description: A captivating account of the history of cancer, its treatment, and the ongoing battle to find a cure, told through the lens of the disease's impact on patients and medical science.

name: The Innovators
description: Walter Isaacson's biography of the people who created the computer and the Internet, highlighting their contributions to the modern digital world.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: Yuval Noah Harari examines the history of human evolution, from the emergence of Homo sapiens to the present day, exploring how our species came to dominate the Earth.

name: The Selfish Gene
description: Richard Dawkins introduces the concept of gene-centered evolution, explaining how natural selection operates at the level of the gene rather than the individual or species.

name: A Brief History of Time
description: Stephen Hawking's groundbreaking work on the nature of time, space, and the universe, providing insights into cosmology, black holes, and the big bang theory.

name: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
description: Rebecca Skloot tells the story of Henrietta Lacks, whose cells were used for scientific research without her knowledge, leading to groundbreaking discoveries in medicine and ethics.

name: The Emperor of All Maladies
description: Siddhartha Mukherjee chronicles the history of cancer, from its first documented cases to modern-day treatment breakthroughs, offering an in-depth look at the disease's impact on humanity.

name: The Origin of Species
description: Charles Darwin's seminal work on the theory of evolution, introducing the concept of natural selection and providing evidence for the origin of species through gradual evolutionary processes.

name: The Mismeasure of Man
description: Stephen Jay Gould critiques the history of intelligence testing and its social implications, challenging the assumptions behind the measurement of human intelligence.

name: The Structure of Scientific Revolutions
description: Thomas S. Kuhn explores the history of scientific paradigms and how shifts in scientific understanding lead to revolutionary changes in knowledge and society.

name: The Blind Watchmaker
description: Richard Dawkins argues against the idea of intelligent design, explaining how evolution and natural selection can account for the complexity of life without the need for a designer.

name: The Double Helix
description: James Watson's memoir of the discovery of the structure of DNA, detailing the scientific and personal struggles behind one of the most important breakthroughs in biology.

name: The Universe and the Teacup
description: A look at the intersection of quantum mechanics and everyday life, offering readers an accessible introduction to complex scientific principles.

name: The Gene Machine
description: A deep dive into the latest breakthroughs in genetic engineering, including CRISPR, and the ethical implications of altering human genetics.

name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
description: Daniel Kahneman examines the two systems of thought that drive our decisions: the fast, intuitive system and the slow, deliberate one.

name: The Man Who Mistook His Wife for a Hat
description: Oliver Sacks' collection of case studies about neurological disorders, exploring the complexity of the human brain and the mysteries of perception and cognition.

name: The Big Bang Theory: The Origin of the Universe
description: A concise and clear explanation of the Big Bang theory, exploring the origins of the universe and the science behind the most popular cosmological theory.

name: The Code Book
description: A history of cryptography, from its early days as a tool of war to its modern-day applications in the digital world, exploring how codes have shaped history.

name: The Invention of Nature
description: The biography of Alexander von Humboldt, the explorer and scientist whose ideas helped shape our understanding of nature and its interconnectedness.

name: Astrophysics for People in a Hurry
description: Neil deGrasse Tyson's accessible and entertaining guide to the universe, breaking down complex astrophysical concepts into bite-sized explanations.

name: The Science of Interstellar
description: A look at the scientific accuracy behind the movie Interstellar, exploring the concepts of black holes, time dilation, and the theory of relativity.

name: The Hidden Life of Trees
description: Peter Wohlleben explores the complex and surprisingly social lives of trees, revealing their secret communication and cooperation systems.
